Armor (Shield), Uncommon
While holding this shield, you can use an action to speak its command word and choose one creature that you can see within 30 feet of you to make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. If it fails, the target is blinded for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a new saving throw to regain their sight.
